description: This blueprint creates a Dynatrace Problem
title: Dynatrace Problem

entityTags.title: Entity Tags
entityTags.description: A list of all entity tags of the problem.

evidenceDetails.title: Evidence Details
evidenceDetails.description: A list of all evidence details of the problem.

managementZones.title: Management Zones
managementZones.description: A list of all management zones that the problem belongs to.

problemFilters.title: Problem Filters
problemFilters.description: A list of alerting profiles that match the problem.

severityLevel.title: Severity Level
severityLevel.description: The severity level of the problem.

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: The start time of the problem, in UTC milliseconds.

endTime.title: End Time
endTime.description: The end time of the problem, in UTC milliseconds.

description: This blueprint represents a Dynatrace Entity Type
title: Dynatrace Entity Type

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the monitored entity.

dimensionKey.title: Dimension Key
dimensionKey.description: The dimension key used within metrics for this monitored entity.

entityLimitExceeded.title: Entity Limit Exceeded
entityLimitExceeded.description: Whether the entity creation limit for the given type has been exceeded

managementZones.title: Management Zones
managementZones.description: The placeholder for the list of management zones of an actual entity.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A list of additional properties of the monitored entity type.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: The placeholder for the list of tags of an actual entity.

description: This blueprint represents a Dynatrace Entity
title: Dynatrace Entity

firstSeen.title: First Seen
firstSeen.description: The timestamp at which the entity was first seen, in UTC milliseconds.

lastSeen.title: Last Seen
lastSeen.description: The timestamp at which the entity was last seen, in UTC milliseconds.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A list of tags of the entity.

managementZones.title: Management Zones
managementZones.description: A list of all management zones that the entity belongs to.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: A list of additional properties of the entity.

fromRelationships.title: From Relationships
fromRelationships.description: A list of all relationships where the entity is the source.

toRelationships.title: To Relationships
toRelationships.description: A list of all relationships where the entity is the target.

description: This blueprint represents a Dynatrace SLO
title: Dynatrace SLO

target.title: Target
target.description: The target value of the SLO.

burnRateMetricKey.title: Burn Rate Metric Key
burnRateMetricKey.description: The key for the SLO's error budget burn rate func metric.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: The warning value of the SLO. At warning state the SLO is still fulfilled but is getting close to failure.

error.title: Error
error.description: The error of the SLO calculation. If the value differs from NONE, there is something wrong with the SLO calculation.

errorBudget.title: Error Budget
errorBudget.description:
The error budget of the calculated SLO.
The error budget is the difference between the calculated and target values. A positive number means all is good; a negative number means trouble.
Has the value of the evaluated error budget or the value of -1:
- If there is an error with the SLO calculation; in that case check the value of the error property.
- If the evaluate parameter has not been set to true; in that case the error property will contain no error.

errorBudgetBurnRate.title: Error Budget Burn Rate
errorBudgetBurnRate.description: The error budget burn rate of the SLO.

errorBudgetMetricKey.title: Error Budget Metric Key
errorBudgetMetricKey.description: The key for the SLO's error budget func metric.

evaluatedPercentage.title: Evaluated Percentage
evaluatedPercentage.description:
The calculated status value of the SLO.
Has the value of the evaluated error budget or the value of -1:
- If there is an error with the SLO calculation; in that case check the value of the error property.
- If the evaluate parameter has not been set to true; in that case the error property will contain no error.

evaluationType.title: Evaluation Type
evaluationType.description: The type of the SLO evaluation.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: The filter for the SLO evaluation.

metricExpression.title: Metric Expression
metricExpression.description: The percentage-based metric expression for the calculation of the SLO.

metricKey.title: Metric Key
metricKey.description: The key for the SLO's status func metric.

normalizedErrorBudgetMetricKey.title: Normalized Error Budget Metric Key
normalizedErrorBudgetMetricKey.description: The key for the SLO's normalized error budget func metric.

relatedOpenProblems.title: Related Open Problems
relatedOpenProblems.description: Number of open problems related to the SLO. Has the value of -1 if there's an error with fetching SLO related problems.

relatedTotalProblems.title: Related Total Problems
relatedTotalProblems.description: Number of total problems related to the SLO. Has the value of -1 if there's an error with fetching SLO related problems.

timeframe.title: Timeframe
timeframe.description: The timeframe for the SLO evaluation.
